name: Apps such as Zendesk moves to app bar and works normally when App bar is enabled

inline.description:
1. Start your server with the Feature Flag for the Apps Bar in a True state `MM_FEATUREFLAGS_AppBarEnabled=true`
2. Deploy a build of the Zendesk App
3. Install the Zendesk App
inline.expectedResult:
- The Zendesk App is shown in the Apps bar header
- The icon opens a modal when click (note:Â The user will see a message that subscriptions are unavailable if they click the icon without a subscription target setup)
